trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zones and are used to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 컨트롤에 대 한 기본 클래스 역할을 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 편집 하는 데 사용 되며 영역 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPart class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived EditorPart controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom EditorPart controls.
trans-unit.target: EditorPart 클래스에는 사용자 지정 EditorPart 컨트롤만 웹 파트 컨트롤 집합와 함께 제공 되는 파생된 EditorPart 컨트롤에서 사용 되는 메서드 및 속성의 기본 집합을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An EditorPart control allows a user to edit an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics.
trans-unit.target: EditorPart 컨트롤에는 사용자가 연결 된 편집 하도록 허용 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>레이아웃, 모양, 속성, 동작, 또는 기타 특성을 수정 하 여 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The editing user interface (UI), which consists of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones that contain EditorPart controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 구성 된 편집 사용자 인터페이스 (UI) <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>EditorPart 컨트롤만 포함 된 영역은 웹 페이지 편집 모드로 전환 후에 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An EditorPart control can be used only within a zone that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 EditorPart 컨트롤에서 파생 되는 영역 내 에서만 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>클래스 같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 선택할 수 있는 페이지가 편집 모드를 입력 한 후 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤이 선택 된 컨트롤의 동사 메뉴에서 편집 동사를 클릭 하 여 편집 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>한 번에 컨트롤을 편집할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several derived EditorPart controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에 나열 된 몇 가지 파생된 EditorPart 컨트롤만 웹 파트 컨트롤 집합으로 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 컨트롤 대부분의 응용 프로그램에 필요한 편집 기능을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `<zonetemplate>` element, where `<zonetemplate>` is the child element of an `<asp:editorzone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 페이지 지 속성 형식을 선언 하는 웹 파트 페이지에서 이러한 컨트롤을 사용 하기 위한 일반적인 방법을 `<zonetemplate>` 요소, 여기서 `<zonetemplate>` 의 자식 요소는 `<asp:editorzone>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the Example section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 코드 예제에서는이 항목의 예제 섹션을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: |Type of control|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>|Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>|Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone.
trans-unit.target: | 컨트롤의 형식 | 설명 | |---------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>| 제목 텍스트, 높이, 너비 및 테두리 특성 등의 속성을 포함 하 여 연결된 된 컨트롤의 모양을 편집 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>| 편집할 수 있는지 여부가, 여부 닫을 수 있습니다, 또는 다른 영역으로 이동할 수 있는지 여부와 같은 연결된 된 컨트롤의 동작을 편집 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>|Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>|Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, all the EditorPart controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: 이 컨트롤 공유 개인 설정 범위에서 컨트롤을 편집할 때에 페이지에 표시 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>| 일반 또는 최소화 된 (축소) 상태로 인지 영역 등 연결된 된 컨트롤에 대 한 편집 레이아웃 특성에 배치 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>| 이러한 속성은 소스 코드에서 선언 된 경우 연결된 된 컨트롤의 속성을 편집는 `WebBrowsable` 특성. | > [!NOTE] > 접근성 향상을 위해 모든 EditorPart 제어 웹 파트 컨트롤 집합 내에서 렌더링 됩니다 제공는 `<fieldset>` 요소.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given EditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>` 요소 주어진된 EditorPart 컨트롤에서 편집을 위해 사용 되는 컨트롤 관련된 집합을 그룹화 하 고 시각적 사용자 에이전트 (예: 일반적인 웹 브라우저)와 음성 기반의 사용자 에이전트 (예: 화면 읽기)에 대 한 이러한 컨트롤 간의 탭된 탐색을 용이 하 게 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 상속된 된 클래스 인스턴스에 사용할 수 있도록 클래스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 상속된 된 클래스에 의해서만 호출 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Saves the values in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 값을 저장 한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 컨트롤은 연결 된 해당 속성을 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 메서드는 중요 한 메서드가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: 추상 메서드와으로 정의 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>클래스와 상속 된 컨트롤에 의해 구현 되어야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 입력 한에 값을 저장 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤에서 해당 속성을는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>에서 참조 되는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 메서드는 확인 또는 편집 사용자 인터페이스 (UI)에서 동사를 적용을 나타내는 단추를 클릭할 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>저장 작업에서 값의 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 컨트롤을 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 제어 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 (오류가 발생할 경우), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 되어야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 선택할 때 표시 된 연결 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 컨트롤은 편집 모드에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control checks the Display property to determine whether to display the control.
trans-unit.target: At 편집의 특정 지점을 처리를 포함 하는 영역은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤을 표시할지 여부를 결정 디스플레이 속성을 검사 하는 컨트롤입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: There are two scenarios where the Display property returns `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 표시 속성을 반환 하는 두 가지 시나리오가 있습니다 `false` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤이 표시 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 편집 중인 컨트롤의 경우 첫 번째 시나리오는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.
trans-unit.target: 편집 중인 컨트롤에 두 번째 시나리오 발생 해당 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A>속성으로 설정 `true`, 개인 설정 범위는 페이지의 사용자 수준에서 설정 되는 반면,.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 표시 해야 하는지를 나타내는 부울 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 제목 표시줄에 표시 되는 제목 텍스트를 포함 하는 문자열을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property returns either the current value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value.
trans-unit.target: 자료의 현재 값을 반환 하는 DisplayTitle 속성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>속성 또는 컨트롤에는 계산 된 값 제목이 없는 경우.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls.
trans-unit.target: 계산 된 값 제목 없는 컨트롤에 대 한 지역화할 수 있는 리소스 문자열을 구성 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In the cases where no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property, the value of the DisplayTitle property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 할당 된 값의 경우에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>속성에서 DisplayTitle 속성의 값과 다른는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the DisplayTitle property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 실행 시 표시 되는 제목의의 현재 실제 값을 계산 된 속성에 대 한 제목을 설정 하려면이 속성을 사용 하도록 하지 마십시오 DisplayTitle 속성을 읽기 전용 되도록 디자인 되었으므로 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: To set a title, use the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 제목을 설정 하려면 기본 사용 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 완전 하 고 표시 제목을 나타내는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은.NET Framework에서 제공 된 계산, culture 관련 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the current state of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control's parent zone.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태를 검색 한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 컨트롤의 부모 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignModeState method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 포함 된 영역 상태에 대 한 정보를 반환 하는 GetDesignModeState 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 상태 정보는 사전의 형태로 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that has the current state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>올려진의 현재 상태는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 포함 된 영역은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 컨트롤.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: In addition to calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method, the OnPreRender method also checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 기본을 호출 하는 것 외에도 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>메서드, OnPreRender 메서드는 또한 확인 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is also set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 값이 `false`는 컨트롤이 표시 되지 않아야, 즉 하면 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>도 속성이 `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 컨트롤은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 현재 디자인 모드 상태의 특성을 적용 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 포함 된 영역은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains state data for displaying the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>영역을 표시 하는 것에 대 한 상태 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control for its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값을 검색 한 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 연결에 대 한 제어 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 메서드는 중요 한 메서드가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is defined as an abstract method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and must be implemented by inherited controls.
trans-unit.target: 추상 메서드와으로 정의 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>클래스와 상속 된 컨트롤에 의해 구현 되어야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property, and update the fields in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 메서드가의 목적은에서 현재 값을 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>에서 참조 된 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>속성의 필드를 업데이트 하 고는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>사용자가 편집할 수 있도록이 값을 가진 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 메서드가 호출 될 때마다 값은 연결 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤 변경 했을 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 모든 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>호출한 직후 SyncChanges 메서드를 호출 하는 컨트롤을 포함 하는 영역은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>메서드를 있도록 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤은 연결 된 값과 항상 동기화 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 메서드를 호출 하는 경우에도 시기는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤이 편집 모드로 전환 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SyncChanges method is not called after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 후 the SyncChanges 메서드가 호출 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>해당 메서드가 반환 하는 경우 메서드 `false`경우 오류가 발생 했기 때문에,.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with the current Web page.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> 현재 웹 페이지와 연결 된 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control needs a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤에 대 한 참조가 필요는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>의 값을 확인 하는 페이지의 현재 개인 설정 범위를 확인 해야 하기 때문에 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.Display%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Personalization scope is determined by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A> property, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 개인 설정 범위를 확인 하 여 결정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>속성을 통해 액세스할 수 있는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the page.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> 페이지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 현재 편집 중인 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>컨트롤 (또는 다른 서버 또는 사용자 정의 컨트롤) 하는 현재 편집 중인의 값에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the WebPartToEdit property provides a reference to that control.
trans-unit.target: 하나의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>WebPartToEdit 속성은 해당 컨트롤에 대 한 참조를 제공 컨트롤이 편집 모드일 때 및 한 번에 컨트롤을 편집할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone has added the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> property to the WebPartToEdit property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 후의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>영역에 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤 컨트롤의 컬렉션, 그런 다음 할당의 고유 값 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A>WebPartToEdit 속성에 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control uses the WebPartToEdit property especially in its two critical methods--<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>--to get and set the property values on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤 WebPartToEdit 속성을 사용 하 여 두 가지 중요 한 메서드는 특히에서<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>-을 가져오고 연결된 된 컨트롤에 속성 값을 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that is currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 편집 모드에서 현재 사용 중인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone that contains an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 참조는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 포함 된 영역은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Although the Zone property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.
trans-unit.target: 영역 속성은 읽기 전용 이지만 경우에 포함 된 영역 개체에 대 한 참조를 제공 하기는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>컨트롤을 변경할 수 있습니다 프로그래밍 방식으로 해당 영역에서 속성 값.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> 컨트롤을 포함 하 합니다.
